thread.title: Convenient location, good size for family holiday
thread.title_full: Convenient location, good size for family holiday - Review of Novotel Suites Paris Issy les Moulineaux, Issy-les-Moulineaux, France - TripAdvisor

author: Kay_and_Family
title: Convenient location, good size for family holiday
text: This hotel had good size rooms with separate shower, bathtub and toilet. It had a comfy double bed and a separate sofa bed, as well as a small table and chair. However, the breakfast is very basic with no hot meals. The great part is that it is very close to train and tram stations and the Eiffel Tower is only 3 stops away. So after a day out, its very convenient to come back to the hotel.
